mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand ( trade_id, `name`, `order`, title, keyword, description, logo_url, logo_real_url, content ) VALUES ( #{tradeId}, #{name}, #{order}, #{title}, #{keyword}, #{description}, #{logoUrl}, #{logoRealUrl}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.id 'id', t.name 'tradeName', b.`name` 'name', b.`order` 'order', b.title 'title', b.keyword 'keyword', b.description 'description', b.logo_url 'logoUrl', b.logo_real_url 'logoRealUrl', b.content 'content' FROM brand b LEFT JOIN trade t ON b.trade_id = t.id LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT b.id 'id', b.trade_id 'tradeId', t.name 'tradeName', b.`name` 'name', b.`order` 'order', b.title 'title', b.keyword 'keyword', b.description 'description', b.logo_url 'logoUrl', b.logo_real_url 'logoRealUrl', b.content 'content' FROM brand b LEFT JOIN trade t ON b.trade_id = t.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
SELECT id 'key', `name` 'value' FROM brand WHERE trade_id = #{tradeId}
